description: This file defines a React functional component named HUD that renders the top head-up display (HUD) area of a game interface, showing game stats such as level, score, and target score.

methods.name: HUD({ level, score, targetScore })
methods.description: React functional component that displays game statistics such as level, score, and target score in the HUD.
